description: The Austin Public Library maintains several social networking sites. Various Library staff are responsible for overall administration of these sites. The mission of these social networking sites is to promote Austin Public Library's resources and services. These sites might include thematic item lists from our collection; topics related to today's events and news; research tips; field trips to other libraries; Texas authors and artists; photos; videos; and library trends.
